Using WP Socializer

Using WP Socializer is very very easy. Just follow the steps:

  1. Customize the buttons settings in the respective tabs.
  2. Go to the "Placement" tab (Green colored) and insert the button code in the textboxes available.
  3. In that tab, select the pages where you want to show the buttons.
  4. Save it !

Using the "One click" feature

If you find difficult customizing WP Socializer. Go to the "One click" tab, select the templates, which are made by default. Then save it !
